reviewtext: These headphones are simply the best headsets ever made. Clear highs, deep lows. I have been using them for years and occasionally need to replace them. $50 at almost any store that sells them, I found them on Amazon for $35.I've tried many other brands over the years and many price ranges, including the noise canceling Bose ones (they hurt my ears.)Nothing comes close.My son destroyed the pair I bought here a few years ago so he's not touching these :-)
